episodes.title: Dad Turned His Daughter's Friends into Slaves: Inside Larry Ray's College Sex Cult
episodes.description:
This episode dives into one of the most disturbing true crime cases to emerge from an elite college campus. Larry Ray, a manipulative and charismatic father figure, infiltrated his daughter’s social circle and gradually gained control over her friends using psychological abuse, coercion, and fear to exploit them over several years.

Through emotional manipulation, isolation, and financial control, Ray created a cult-like environment where young students were stripped of their autonomy and forced into submission. What began as trust and mentorship slowly turned into a nightmare of exploitation.

This story exposes how abuse can hide in plain sight, the dangers of unchecked authority, and the long-lasting impact of psychological control. A chilling reminder that cult dynamics don’t always look the way we expect.

episodes.title: 33: BARBARIC: Mom in Polygamist Cult STABS Her Baby to Death After "Pouring Sin" Into Her
episodes.description: Hannah Driver was born into an unusual lifestyle: Her mother, Chloe was one of 3 wives married to her father, Brian. After being a part of this "polygamist cult" for years, Chloe started showing signs of mental illness, until one day she took the most drastic action possible: killing her own baby in the most horrific, brutal way possible.
